resources.string: HànBǎoBāo must be enabled in Accessibility Settings for Tap mode to work.

Enable quick, on-touch access from any app. This allows the app to see anything on your screen. HanBaoBao uses this to quickly transliterate Chinese text. Only enable this if you trust this application.

Type the symbol below into any text field to start a quick lookup! For example, if the symbol is #, try typing \'# hamburger\'. Note that HànBǎoBāo must be enabled in Accessibility Settings for this feature to work.
Allows the app to see any text on your screen
